pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.1_0: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.2_0: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanto tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.3_0: Akkhāyite sarīre methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.4_0: yebhuyyena khāyite sarīre methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.5_0: vaṭṭakate mukhe acchupantaṁ aṅgajātaṁ paveseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa—
pli-tv-pvr1.8:1.6_0: methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanto imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:2.1_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti, sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā, channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti, catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ, sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:2.2_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr1.8:2.5_0: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:2.7_0: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:2.10_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.8:3.1_0: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karonto kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:3.2_0: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karonto ekaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:3.4_0: anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karonto imaṁ ekaṁ āpattiṁ āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:4.1_0: Sā āpatti catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajati, sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā, channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ, sattannaṁ, samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammati?
pli-tv-pvr1.8:4.2_0: Sā āpatti catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ ekaṁ vipattiṁ bhajati—
pli-tv-pvr1.8:4.7_0: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr1.8:4.10_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
